overview: After losing his job, Jackson regretfully joins his two friends, Nick and Allan, in a drug deal to make some cash. Along the way, Jackson is dosed and must endure the night and his demons while tripping. As the drug deal goes awry, his trip begins to as well, taking him on a journey through his mind. He attempts to find meaning in life and himself, all while hopefully learning to save his friends.
tagline: A man, out of his job, tries to help his friends.
title: Guilt Trip
